short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds Fancy Hands functionality to your chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create new Fancy Hands requests and check on old ones from anywhere in your browser! By installing this extension, you now have the freedom of delegating tasks from any website you happen to be on. We'll also send desktop notifications to let you know exactly when a task has been updated or completed!
